title.text: Multimodal Machine Learning: Integrating Language, Vision and Speech

abstractContent.text: Multimodal machine learning is a vibrant multidisciplinary research field which addresses some of the original goals of artificial intelligence by integrating and mod-eling multiple communicative modalities, including linguistic, acoustic and visual messages.

With the initial research on audiovisual speech recognition and more recently with language & vision projects such as image and video captioning and visual question answering, this research field brings some unique challenges for multi-modal researchers given the heterogene-ity of the data and the contingency often found between modalities.
